summary:
**This Profile is Operated by Amelia Everton, the Ai Assistant of Johannes Holt Iversen.
All correspondence is directed to the designated Art Gallery or Art Advisory Agent.**

Experienced fine arts professional with a demonstrated history of working in the music industry additionally. Skilled in Music Licensing, Contextual Advertising, User Experience Design, Content Marketing, and Music Composition. Strong professional with a BA-degree in digital media and communication. Recently graduated with a Bachelor of Fine Arts (B.F.A.) focused in Fine and Studio Arts from Gerrit Rietveld Academie Amsterdam.

treasury_media.title: CONTACT
treasury_media.description: Johannes Holt Iversen is a Danish painter and sculptor currently located in Amsterdam, Netherlands. He is an apprentice of Danish painter and sculptor Erik Rytter.

treasury_media.title: LATEST PRESS
treasury_media.description: Johannes Holt Iversen (born 8 September 1989) is a Danish painter and sculptor currently located in Amsterdam, Netherlands.[1][2][3] He is an apprentice of Danish painter and sculptor Erik Rytter (former assistant of Poul Gernes).[4]

projects.title: Spotify Exclusive (Co-Branding Strategy)
projects.description: Developing, designing and executing a Co-Branding Strategy as a Recording Artist and collaborating with streaming platform Spotify. Development of content marketing (Spotify Facebook), branding strategy, development of Audio Spots, social media engagement and implementation of Spotify Exclusive releases in the overall music release strategy and developing media coverage.

projects.title: COOP Danmark A/S - Kvickly: RESPEKT (The New Warehouse)
projects.description:
Illustrator, art director and concept developer on pilot-project held between danish warehouse Kvickly and University of Aalborg. Concept was developed as a part of my 5th Semester on my BA in Communication at Aalborg University using Persuasive Design and interaction design as the key elements. 
Later on used for inspiration and implemented by COOP Denmark A/S in the Kvickly inspirational portfolio 2014/2016.

examples of concept illustrations:
http://kvickly2013.files.wordpress.com/2013/11/sketch-2013-10-29-16_25_18.png
http://kvickly2013.files.wordpress.com/2013/11/kvickly_poster4_2013.jpg

company.name: CHRISTA's Fine Tribal & Modern Art Gallery

profile_positions.company: CHRISTA's Fine Tribal & Modern Art Gallery
profile_positions.description:
CHRISTA´S Fine Tribal and Modern Art Gallery, one of Copenhagen´s exclusive galleries, exhibits fine tribal art works from Africa and India and contemporary western art inspired by primitivism.
Lately the gallery has been offering works by the post war avant-garde movement CoBrA among their modern art collection is artists such as Asger Jorn, Karel Appel, Corneille and Carl-Henning Pedersen.
profile_positions.title: Part-Time Assistance

profile_positions.description:
As a musician or music teacher, you will find that there are many good reasons for you to join DMF, the Danish Musicians Union. Standing united results in the bonding of a common spirit, something that has given many musicians advantages they otherwise would not have had, and something that has generally given musicians a stronger position on the market. And the advantages do not stop there. Many a musician would go on record to say that the facilities, benefits and special offers DMF provides to its members would be reason enough to join.

Type of job: Board Member at Danish Musicians Union
profile_positions.title: Board Member

profile_positions.description:
Band consultant/coach: Project Management, Distribution, Digital Marketing
Business Consultant: Strategy, Communication, Content Marketing, Social Media
Content Developer: Photographer, Videographer, Editing, Subtitler, Transription, Web-TV, Sync Music

* Consultant and radio-promoter for Shira Gavrielov (American Idol 2013)
* Business to Business consultant providing know-how to Telenor, Dansk Musiker Forbund etc.
* Content developer (Videographer/Editing) for Ball Group A/S
* Commercial Partnership with music streaming service Spotify AB
profile_positions.title: Owner / Concept Developer

profile_positions.description:
Owner of Sound Soldier Records
and Sound Soldier Consultancy Services

Sound Soldier Records is an independent music company, besides publishing and distribution do we offer consultancy programs through our Sound Soldier Consultancy Services. Through coaching and guidance about important aspects of the music business, do we help the artist or business, build and understand its possibilities of being an DIY (Do-It-Yourself) creative business or musician. We are specialized in digital marketing, digital distribution and international music business. We have many years of experience in the music industry, a great network and a big knowledge regarding the essential aspects of music rights, marketing, distribution, project managing and organizing.
profile_positions.title: Label Manager

Pop, R&B/Soul, Motown & Contemporary R&B.
profile_positions.title: Recording Artist

profile_positions.description:
Diva Models was founded in 1987. With offices in Aarhus and Copenhagen, Denmark, Diva Models is one of the most established model agencies in Scandinavia. We work closely with clients all over the world and throughout the years we have established a world-wide network making us capable of offering the right solutions for both model and client.

At Diva the models are our first priority, they are our brand and pride, they are human beings and a living example of the quality that exists at Diva Models. For us it is important to preserve the spirit of our work. This is done by creating a positive environment based on mutual respect and well-being.

Projects:
* Carlsberg Copenhagen (Photo/TV) [McCann Worldgroup]

Type of Work: Model / Fashion Model
http://divamodels.com/default.aspx?pageid=6&action=divadetails&divaid=817
profile_positions.title: Fashion Model

profile_positions.description:
ReinventMusic is an Independent A&R and Promotional Company founded by a consortium of forward-looking music professionals bent on breaking the boundaries of traditional music models. We cater to all genres, blues/rock, jazz, Brazilian, blues, rock, hard rock, punk rock, heavy metal, light metal, standards, pop, hip hop, bebop, doo wop, dj, country, R&B, folk, old school, new school, new age, young age. We are a fusion of an artist representation and production company specializing in “old school” artist development. Our artists, together have established a music business cooperative whose goals are to grow and create a sustainable business model within rapidly changing industry dynamics without sacrificing artistic integrity. 

Job included additional duties as: Art Director - Graphic Designer - Concept Developer

* Logo Development
* Identity
profile_positions.title: Marketing Intern

profile_positions.description:
Danish Models has existed in 28 years with Lykke Biangslev as owner in 24 years. Danish Models has several offices in Jutland, Fyn and Sjælland, where they can deliver professional models in all ages all over the country. 

The 28 years, that Danish Models has existed, gives the agency the possibilities to deliver models in all sides of the fashion industry: Commercial film, catalogue, events, fashion show.

Type of Work: Studio / Commercial Model

http://danishmodels.com/dmi.php?pageID=8&id=1117&arg=1&picture=0

profile_positions.description:
LN Eurocom Tele Services A/S is one of Denmarks biggest call centre with more than 1.000 employees. With three departments in Aalborg, Århus and Copenhagen. They deliver services within technical support, customer services, telemarketing and outplacement. Serving clients and partners always happens with high quality during the complete deliverance. Every task gets solved in an individually manner in close collaboration with our clients and partners and according to specific service demands. On behalf of an widely technical advanced infrastructure is LN Eurocom Tele Services litterally speaking capable of taking all sorts of accounts in.
With more than 16.000 daily phonecalls on 5 different languages, is LN Eurocom Tele Services providing services to some of Scandinavias biggest companies.

Type of job: Agent at LN Eurocom Tele Services A/S
Department: TeliaSonera Department.
profile_positions.title: Telemarketing Agent
